long_description: The 10-inch Aerobie(R) Superdisc(TM) is renowned for stable, accurate flights--very easy for people of all skill levels to throw well. The breakthrough spoiler rim design of this disc centers the aerodynamic lift of the disc during its entire flight, making it a very stable flyer. Soft rubber edge provides a great grip for strong throws, makes disc soft to catch, and protects disc from developing sharp scratches and burrs. Soft edge is also kind to a dog's mouth when disc is used for play with a dog. Floats in water for beach play. Recommended for kids 8 years old and up. Single disc comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The 10-inch Aerobie(R) Superdisc(TM) is renowned for stable, accurate flights--very easy for people of all skill levels to throw well.
